title: Himi 631
lyrics:
M.L. loua
1.
’ Ā hake kāinga lotu ē,
Hiva hosana fulipē,
Kau ‘i he fakafiefia
‘A e hositē ‘i Langi na.
Ko ‘eni kuo hoko mai
‘A e ‘ū palōfisai ne fai
‘E he kau palōfita mu’a,
Ke ha’u tangata ‘a e ‘Otua.
2.
Talu he tala ki he ngata,
Hili ‘a e hū ‘a Angahala,
Ke hoko mai ‘o laiki fu’u
‘E he Hako na hono ‘ulu,
Holi ‘e he kakai kotoa
Ke a’usia ‘a e tala’ofa
Mo piki ‘e he kau mātu’a
He palōmesi ‘a e ‘Otua.
3.
Nau ‘amanaki te nau ma’u,
Ka tā na’e ‘ikai te nau a’u;
Te’eki hoko hono ho
ua
He finangalo he ‘Ot
ua
.
Mālo ‘enau kitaki mai;
Ko tui pē ne lava ai.
Ka na’e ta’ofi ‘a e koloa
Mo tauhi pē ‘i Langi na.
4.
Neongo ia na’e pau ke ha’u
‘A e Toko taha kuo lau.
Fakafeta’i ‘o ta’engata;
‘A e mana kuo tau mātā!
Ko e ‘Eiki kuo hoko mai,
Hotau huhu’i kuo fai,
Mole ‘a e mala mei Māmani,
Ava ‘a e matapa ‘o Langi.
5.
Tuʻu hake ‘a e kakai kotoa,
Fakamonū ‘etau koloa.
Tau hiki tue ta’etūkua
He fu’
u
‘ofa na he ‘Otua.
Kae’uma’ā, ‘a e me’a tepu,
Tuku ‘a e ‘Alo ke Ne hū
Ki hotau loto ni mousa’a
Mo ngaohi pē ke angama’a. *
C.P.W.B.
